resources.string:
Post Walk Formalities
 After the event please share photos through following mediums: 
 * Upload selected photographs to dedicated album in our FB group 
 * Flickr: Add photos to our Flickr group 
 http://www.flickr.com/groups/bangalore_photowalk/ 
 and use tag 'blrphotowalk' 
 *500px: Use tag 'blrphotowalk'
